name: HSP_BKT_REC_HX
description:
Additional Payment Reconciliation Information History table.


This table stores a history of the amounts from HSP_BKT_ADDTL_REC, which has the current values.

columns.name: BUCKET_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the bucket record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description: Additional Payment Reconciliation Information - Source of the change

columns.name: INSTANT_OF_ENTRY_TM
columns.description: Additional Payment Reconciliation Information - Instant when the information was updated

columns.name: ADDTL_NA_AMT_HX
columns.description: Additional Payment Reconciliation Information - Not allowed amount history

columns.name: ADDTL_PAYOR_PMT_HX
columns.description: This column stores the payer payment amount history.

columns.name: ADDTL_N_CVD_CHGS_HX
columns.description: Additional Payment Reconciliation Information - Non-covered charges history

columns.name: ADDTL_TOT_CHGS_HX
columns.description: This column stores the payer reported amount of total charges history.

columns.name: ADDTL_REPT_HX_DATE
columns.description: This column stores the date on the report from the payer history.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account to which the liability bucket is linked.

columns.name: ADDTL_TYPE_HX_C_NAME
columns.description: Additional Payment Reconciliation Information - report type history.
